text: Röllbach is a municipality in the Miltenberg district in the Lower Franconia region in Bavaria, Germany and a member of the Administrative Community of Mönchberg. == Geography == === Place === The municipality is in the Spessart (range), in the Mainviereck (“Main Square”) between Klingenberg, Mönchberg and Großheubach. == References == Category:Miltenberg (district)
title: Röllbach
